definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: betroth (Mish. [[ארס]], Ph. [[ארש]] in n.pr., Lag:Sem i. 50 connects with Ar. 0’ar4un a fine, lit. pay the price, & so gain the right of possession; cf. Aram. [[אָרִיס]] one who farms land; As. mirsu, tribute, Zehnpf:BAS i. 518)—only

definitions.title: Pi. Pu.; Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[אֵרֵשׂ]] De 20:7; [[אֵרַשְׂתִּי]] 2Sa 3:14; sf. [[אֵרַשְׂתִּיח]] Ho 2:21, Ho 2:21, Ho 2:22; Impf. 2 ms. [[תְּאָרֵשׂ]] De 28:30; —betroth (subj. man) obj. woman, [[אִשָּׁה]] De 20:7, De 28:30; sq. [[ב]] of price paid to father & [[ל]] of husband 2Sa 3:14; [[ב]] of gift to bride & [[ל]] of husband Ho 2:21, Ho 2:22, where fig. of Yahweh's covenant mercy to Israe1.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[אׂרָָשָׂה]] be betrothed, c. [[לֽא]], subj. [[בְּתוּלָה]] Ex 22:15, De 22:28 ([[נער בתולה]]); Pt. f. [[מְאׂרָשָׂה]] De 22:23, where affirmed of [[נער בתולה]] (sq. [[ל]] of husband) v:De 22:25, v:De 22:27 (in both subj. [[הַנַּעֲרָ֠]]).
